targets.expr: sum(delta(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service=~"$app", namespace="atlas", status_code="200", handler!="/v1/"}[5m]))
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app"}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method)
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app", status_code=~"5.."}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method)
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app", status_code=~"4.."}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method)
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app", status_code="3.."}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method)

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, service, handler, method))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, service, handler, method))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, service, handler, method))

sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app", status_code="200"}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method) / sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="atlas", handler!="/v1/", handler!~".*ConnectionError.*", service=~"$app"}[$__interval])) by (service, handler, method)
sum(delta(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service=~"$app", namespace="atlas", status_code=~"5..", handler!="/v1/"}[5m]))
sum(delta(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service=~"$app", namespace="atlas", status_code=~"4..", handler!="/v1/"}[5m]))
sum(delta(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service=~"$app", namespace="atlas", status_code=~"3..", handler!="/v1/"}[5m]))
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{handler!="/v1/", service=~"$app", status_code="200"}[$__interval])) by (method, handler, service, status_code)
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{handler!="/v1/", service=~"$app", status_code!="200"}[$__interval])) by (method, handler, service, status_code)
sum by (ErrorCode,HttpCode,job) (rate(error_counter{job=~"$app"}[$__interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, handler, method))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, handler, method))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$app", handler!="/v1/", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, handler, method))
sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{handler!="/v1/", service=~"$app", status_code=~"^$status_code"}[$__interval])) by (method, status_code, service)
sum(rate(external_request_duration_count{namespace="atlas", job=~"$app", status="200"}[$__interval])) by (host, service, status)
sum(rate(external_request_duration_count{namespace="atlas", job=~"$app", status!="200"}[$__interval])) by (host, service, status)
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(external_request_duration_bucket{job=~"$app", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, host, service))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(external_request_duration_bucket{job=~"$app", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, host, service))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(external_request_duration_bucket{job=~"$app", namespace="atlas"}[$__interval])) by (le, host, service))
sum(rate(external_request_duration_count{namespace="atlas", job=~"$app"}[$__interval])) by (host, status)
